label.loading: Just a moment, workspaces are being synchronized.
label.name: Workspace name
label.initialTemplate: Create initial template for your workspace

description.new: Start by giving your workspace a name and selecting its type.
description.individual: Workspace for your use. Only you have access to this workspace.
description.organization: Workspace for your organization. You can invite multiple users to this type of workspace.
description.type: Note that you cannot change the type of a workspace once it is created.
description.welcome: This is a collaborative workspace system. Streamline your workflow so you can focus more on what matters.
description.invite: This platform is designed to be used with your team. Invite your colleagues to join you in your workspace.
description.inviteMany: You can invite multiple users at once by separating their email addresses with a comma.
description.workspaceSettings: Set up your workspace settings. You can always change these later.
description.userSettings: Set up your user settings. You can always change these later.
description.language: Select the language you want to use by default. You can change this manually later for each document.
description.fullSentences: Use full sentences by default in your documents instead of bullet points.
description.initialTemplate: You can create a document template by using an existing template or by uploading a previously created document.

toast.invalidEmail: Please enter valid email addresses separated by commas.
toast.initialTemplateSuccess: Initial template created successfully. When the system has processed the template, you will be able to use it.
